alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lakeshore Flood Watch issued February 18 at 10:27PM EST until February 19 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKESHORE FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM EST SATURDAY THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Significant lakeshore flooding possible. * WHERE...Oswego and Jefferson counties. * WHEN...From 10 AM EST Saturday through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...The combination of high lake levels and significant wave action may result in lakeshore flooding along the immediate lakeshore, especially in bays, inlets, harbors, and other low lying areas along the shoreline. Shoreline erosion is also possible.
info.instruction: A Lakeshore Flood Watch means that conditions favorable for lakeshore flooding are expected to develop. Residents on or near the shore should take action to protect property, and listen to local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for later statements or warnings.
